name: manacore
description: MTG Game Engine & AI Research Platform

scripts.lint: eslint packages/engine/src/**/*.ts packages/ai/src/**/*.ts packages/cli-client/src/**/*.ts packages/data-scraper/src/**/*.ts packages/mcp-server/src/**/*.ts && (cd packages/web-client && eslint src/**/*.{ts,tsx}) && (cd packages/gym-server && eslint src/**/*.ts)
scripts.lint:fix: eslint --fix packages/engine/src/**/*.ts packages/ai/src/**/*.ts packages/cli-client/src/**/*.ts packages/data-scraper/src/**/*.ts packages/mcp-server/src/**/*.ts && (cd packages/web-client && eslint --fix src/**/*.{ts,tsx}) && (cd packages/gym-server && eslint --fix src/**/*.ts)
scripts.typecheck: tsc --noEmit --project packages/engine/tsconfig.json && tsc --noEmit --project packages/ai/tsconfig.json && tsc --noEmit --project packages/cli-client/tsconfig.json && tsc --noEmit --project packages/gym-server/tsconfig.json && tsc --noEmit --project packages/web-client/tsconfig.json
scripts.check: bun run typecheck && bun run lint
